bibl.title: Naukratis as a Contact Zone: Revealing the Lydian Connection.
bibl.note: Offers a new theory with regard to the Greek presence at Naukratis during the late 7th and the first half of the 6th century BC, emphasising the hitherto acknowledged role of Lydians as mediators between Egypt and Greeks. - Naukratis foundation date: How to reconcile between Herodotus and Archaeology? - Lydian imperial aspirations in the 7th and the first half of the 6th centuries BC. - Naukratis: Revealing the Lydian connection. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: "Kulturkontakte in antiken Welten: vom Denkmodell zum Fallbeispiel. Proceedings des internationalen Kolloquiums aus Anlass des 60. Geburtstages von Christoph Ulf, Innsbruck, 26. bis 30. Januar 2009"

bibl.seg: Alexander Fantalkin, Naukratis as a Contact Zone: Revealing the Lydian Connection.

Robert Rollinger & Kordula Schnegg (edd.), Kulturkontakte in antiken Welten: vom Denkmodell zum Fallbeispiel. Proceedings des internationalen Kolloquiums aus Anlass des 60. Geburtstages von Christoph Ulf, Innsbruck, 26. bis 30. Januar 2009 = Colloquia Antiqua. 10 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, 2014) pp. 27-51.

Offers a new theory with regard to the Greek presence at Naukratis during the late 7th and the first half of the 6th century BC, emphasising the hitherto acknowledged role of Lydians as mediators between Egypt and Greeks. - Naukratis foundation date: How to reconcile between Herodotus and Archaeology? - Lydian imperial aspirations in the 7th and the first half of the 6th centuries BC. - Naukratis: Revealing the Lydian connection. - Avec résumé en anglais.
